thread.title: A Book Lovers Dream!
thread.title_full: A Book Lovers Dream! - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: V7713
title: A Book Lovers Dream!
text: My husband and I stayed here during a trip to NYC to celebrate our anniversary. Absolutely everything exceeded our expectations! We were given a complimentary room upgrade to the Mythology room which overlooked library way. The staff, especially Julio, were extremely accommodating. This is an anniversary trip we will always remember!
